description:
Versatile and wrapping footwear, designed for technical approach, and intense performances even on rocky and mixed terrains. In the upper, made of suede leather resistant to abrasion, is integrated the ALS system, which guarantees optimal foot locking in every situation. Moreover, the asymmetrical lacing extended to the toe allows a personalized closure and maximum precision in the fit.

Reinforced toe and heel. The double density microporous wedge is stable and dissipates the impacts with the ground correctly, reducing stress for the foot. The Vibram Gravity outsole has the premium Megagrip compound for a perfect grip on all surfaces, ensuring greater safety even during climbing.
name: Kayland - R.O.I. Recreation Outfitters Inc. Vitrik GTX - Mens
